title: Portfolio Workshop
desc: Interested in building your design portfolio but don‚Äôt know where to start? Want to make your portfolio stand out to recruiters? Join us for our How to Build Your Portfolio workshop this Wednesday with our wonderful Workshop committee! üî® üåü

title: Career Circles: Job & Internship Prep

Whether you‚Äôre refining your resume, improving your design portfolio, or seeking expert career advice, we‚Äôve got you covered! ü´° The session will also provide the opportunity for you to volunteer and have your portfolio critiqued live in front of a small group. This is a great way to gain valuable insights and see how others approach feedback, too! üöÄ üåü Please bring your portfolios and get ready for some hands-on help!

title: Design Interviews
desc: Want to brush up on your interview skills? Come out to our interview workshop tomorrow! DAUCI board will give personalized pointers and help you practice common design interview questions üñãÔ∏èüéôÔ∏è

title: Stakeholder Showdown
desc: Interested in design? Curious about how developers and designers work together? Join us for an interactive and beginner-friendly event with Design @ UCI where you‚Äôll collaborate with fellow students and tackle real-world challenges! This workshop will focus on the process of creating wireframes while managing the tricky demands of stakeholders. You‚Äôll learn how to apply key UI/UX principles, collaborate across disciplines, and get hands-on experience. Whether you‚Äôre a developer or a designer, this event will give you practical insights into the collaborative process of building great products!

desc: Join us for a fun social where you will design lofi and hifi wireframes with your houses üíõüíôüíú Remember to bring your laptops! See you there ü´°‚ÄºÔ∏è

title: Intro to UI/UX Design
desc: DAUCI is excited to welcome Agnes Tran, a designer at IBM, to provide an intro to UI/UX design! Join us to hear about her firsthand experiences working in the UI/UX world at a big tech company! üîç

title: Intro to Figma
desc: Join us for our first workshop of the year: our Figma workshop!! This will be in collaboration with Figma to help you learn more about this industry standard platform! No experience required, but be sure to RSVP through the link in our bio üñåÔ∏èüåü See you there!!

title: First General Meeting
desc: We're back for our first general meeting of the year! Come out to learn more about our board and what we have to offer. Can't wait to meet you!

title: Smores by the Shore
desc: Join Data at UCI, Hack at UCI, AI at UCI, Design at UCI and CTC at UCI for our bonfire event to kickstart the year! Come hang out, enjoy some food, and make s‚Äômores! Rides are offered on a first come first serve basis at 5:30 PM, so be sure to RSVP!

title: Yapping at Yogurtland
place: Yogurtland (meet at the UCI Flag Poles)

title: Design Career Exploration Panel
desc: üöÄ Join us for the Design Career Exploration Panel! üé®‚ú® üåü Curious about the different kinds of jobs within the design industry? Discover the diverse career paths in design with insights from industry experts who have excelled in various roles and sectors. Hear from experienced designers and researchers about UI/UX, graphic design, and more. Gain practical advice on integrating research into design practice and leveraging interdisciplinary skills for success.

title: House Social
desc: Hey Designers! Ready for some friendly competition between our Design at UCI houses? Come hang out with us at DBH 6011 where we will reveal our house social competition and win a prize at the end!

title: Cross-Collaboration Between Researcher and Designer
desc: üåü Curious about how researchers and designers collaborate in UX teams? Join us at our industry event, where experts from Warner Music üéµ will share insights into their collaborative process within UX teams. Explore the dynamic synergy between these roles and how it drives innovation in user experience. Whether you're just starting out or are an experienced professional, you‚Äôll gain valuable insights into effective teamwork and how cross-disciplinary collaboration can enhance your UX strategies. üöÄ

title: House Design-Off
desc: Hey Designers! It‚Äôs that time of the quarter to get to know your new house members. Come out to our first social of the quarter to design and create your house aesthetic with some friendly competition. If you have not been sorted into a house, talk to a board member so you can be a part of our house system. Hope to see y‚Äôall there!

title: Alumni Panel
desc: üé® Calling all designers! Wondering what post-grad life is like? Curious about working as a designer full-time? Join us for our Alumni Panel! üåü Listen to our panelists share their experience transitioning from UCI to industry, bootcamp, and grad school. See you there! üöÄ

title: How to Build a Case Study
desc: Welcome back Designers! We wanted to kick off Spring Quarter with a workshop on constructing case studies! Whether you're a beginner designer wondering how to write case studies for your first portfolio, or an experienced designer looking to refresh the look of your case studies, this is the perfect workshop for you. Join Design at UCI as we cover the basic format of a case study, and show you special tips and tricks to create an engaging case study that shows off your hard work, and is sure to catch the eyes of all those looking at your portfolio!

title: Trivia Battle of Olympus
desc: Ready to unleash your creativity and entrepreneurial spirit? Join us for an exciting evening where design meets investment at our very own Shark Tank Night! Come out for a fun night of innovation and leave with investments from our panel of "sharks."

title: Design Recruitment Tips with Arielle Julie
Shark Tank
desc: Ready to unleash your creativity and entrepreneurial spirit? Join us for an exciting evening where design meets investment at our very own Shark Tank Night! Come out for a fun night of innovation and leave with investments from our panel of "sharks."

title: AI X Design
desc: This workshop will discuss the interssection of human-centered data collection with design. We will be exploring the ethics of current data collection methodologies with a research professor working in the intersection of data science, ai, and research. The goal of this workshop is to introduce the intersection of design with data systems to create holistic, human-centered AI technologies and data software.

title: Friends of Figma Speaker Collab (event title tbd)
Dissecting Design Systems
desc: Daunted by the idea of working with a design system? Join Design at UCI as we unravel the intricacies of design systems in the context of design philosophy, and their role in UX Design jobs in the tech industry. From component libraries to consistency principles, we will be showcasing a walk-through demo of using a design system to create a product.

title: Valentine's Day Crafts
desc: In need of a last-minute Valentine's Day gift for a loved one? Celebrate love and get crafty at our Valentine's Day Crafts social!

title: Navigating Summer Internships
desc: In need of a last-minute Valentine's Day gift for a loved one? Celebrate love and get crafty at our Valentine's Day Crafts social!

title: Finals Study Session
desc: Ready for finals, designers? In need of a fun, motivating group study session? Come out to our DAUCI study session to stay productive while hanging out with fellow designers!

title: Fall 2023 Project Teams Demo Day
desc: Hey designers! Come support your fellow designers and see what amazing products they have designed from this fall quarter‚Äôs Project Teams! Project Teams is a quarterly program which provides students with design experience in a collaborative setting. PT Demo Day is open to all UCI members and a great chance for teams to showcase their design, research, and takeaways from the program.

title: Fireside Chat with Jeff Kao from Riot Games
desc: We‚Äôve all heard of League of Legends, but how does a game come to life from a design perspective? üéÆ Join us on Zoom to hear Jeff Kao discuss his experience as a principal UX Designer at Riot Games! üïπÔ∏è This is perfect for gaming enthusiasts and aspiring designers. See you there!

title: Decoding Design Tools
desc: Overwhelmed by the number of design resources available to designers? Not sure how to find the appropriate assets or design systems for your project? Come join us as we break down the resources that Design@UCI have collected, and understand how and when to utilize them for a project! These resources range from accessibility tools, to public libraries for components and assets, to case studies offering advice on how to format a project.

title: Meta Fireside Chat
desc: Wondering how to transition into the design field? Want to learn how to stand out in the job market? Join Mosope, Akolade, and Samuel in a fireside chat as they share their experiences as product designers at Meta! They‚Äôll discuss transitioning from an internship to full-time position and changing career paths. You‚Äôll also have the chance to ask them specific questions near the end of the event. See you there!

title: Design Dash: UCI Scavenger Hunt
desc: How much do you know about UCI? Come out to DAUCI and compete against fellow designers at our night time scavenger hunt.

title: Intro to Web Design
desc: Come out and learn the basics of Web design!

title: Pumpkin Carving
desc:
Hey designers are you ready for the spooky season? Sharpen your carving skills and come out to Design at UCI to carve out some pumpkins and unwind before midterms. Please fill out the rsvp form if you would like to come and participate in the craft. Hope to see you guys there!

Admission fee $2

title: Intro to Web Development
desc:
Are you curious about the fundamentals of web development? Eager to dive into the coding aspects and gain the skills needed to create stunning web interfaces? Dive into the realm of web development with our ‚ÄúIntro to Frontend Development‚Äù workshop! üåê

In this workshop, we'll provide you with the essential tools and knowledge to not only kickstart your web development journey but also empower you to continue learning on your own. We‚Äôll cover the foundational topics from HTML and CSS to JavaScript. üíª‚ú®

title: Intro to the World of Design
desc: Curious about the dynamic and creative world of UI/UX but unsure if you can find a career without a tech degree? Do you believe that design is not limited to any single discipline but can be found at the intersection of technology, art, psychology, and human behavior? If so, ‚ÄúIntro to the World of Design‚Äù is the workshop for you! This workshop is designed to break down the barriers often associated with a career in UI/UX design and welcomes students from all majors, not just computer science or graphic design enthusiasts, to explore the exciting journey into the realm of UI/UX.

title: Intro to Figma with WICS
desc: Interested in bringing your creative designs and visions to life? UI/UX design can make that possible! Join us for an immersive workshop brought to you by WICS and Design at UCI. During this workshop, you will learn about visual design principles and get an in-depth look into the design process. By the end of the workshop you may end up recreating one of your favorite social-media applications such as Instagram, Twitter, and more! We will be making use of Figma‚Äôs design tools for hands-on learning, so be sure to download and sign up for an account before the event (it is free for UCI students).

title: House Design-Off
desc: Welcome new and old designers! Excited to be a part of our new Design houses? Come out to Design at UCI‚Äôs first social event of the year to meet your fellow house members and get creative! Those of you who have not been assigned a house will be sorted at the time of the event. Hope to see y‚Äôall there!

title: (Re)Discovering Your Design Identity with Jeremi Dudu from LinkedIn
desc: Feeling lost in your design journey? Confused on which industry is right for you? Come join us in HICF to hear Jeremi Dudu from LinkedIn share his advice on how to align yourself with your design career to suit your interests and values. The event targets designers of all levels, with specific emphasis on those who are lost and trying to discover themselves and their passion in design.

title: Project Team's Demo Day
desc: Come join us for Project Team's Demo Day! This is a time where your fellow designers will showcase the designs that they have been working on over the last eight weeks. Please come out and show support for the teams! Project Teams is a quarterly program that provides students with design experience in a collaborative setting. Each quarter, students form teams and work on a design project of their choice (i.e. UI/UX design, marketing design, graphic design) from start to finish. You‚Äôll learn essential design skills along the way, get familiar with industry-standard tools, and you‚Äôll have a completed project for your portfolio at the end of it!

title: Fireside Chat with Adobe UX Designers
desc: Join Vicky, Trixia, and Kayla in an engaging conversation as they share their experiences and insights, guiding us through their remarkable journey at Adobe. From their initial roles as interns and new grads to their current positions as accomplished full-time UX designers. They've got some sweet tips and tricks to share on how to rock your internship and crush it in the early stages of your career. Plus, they'll share their unique experiences and the teams they've worked with at Adobe. Don't miss out on this awesome opportunity to learn from these amazing ladies!

title: Typography and Color Theory
desc: Ever wondered how the iconic New York subway signs came to be? Or how to add your style to any font in the world? Join us in SSL 228 to learn about typography in graphic design via Adobe Illustrator! This workshop is for users with all skill levels. Please make sure to have Adobe Illustrator downloaded on your computer before the event! The Adobe Creative Suite is free to all UCI students.

title: Zine-Making Potluck
desc: Are you looking for a fun art or design project to add to your portfolio? Come join us for a zine-making social! This social will also be a potluck, so please fill out the RSVP form if you can bring an item. Any contribution is greatly appreciated! We hope to see you there!

title: Tote Bag Paint Night
desc: Ever wanted to make your own custom tote bag? Come hang out with Design at UCI and unleash your creative side for a social night of tote bag painting! - Limited supply

title: History of Graphic Design
desc: Did you know that the iconic Nike Swoosh was made by a student for only $35? How did this happen, and how did that impact the world of design? Join us in SSL228 on Monday 5/8 at 8pm to learn about the history of graphic design with famous designers and their work in our workshop!

title: Design Tinder
desc: Want to get to know your fellow designers and maybe love too? Join Design at UCI to participate in our first design themed dating roulette to enter and win prizes! We will have an interest form down below for members to sign up if you want to participate. Admission is $3. We hope to see you there!

title: Beyond Design: Navigating Cross-Functional Collaboration
desc: Ever wonder what it's like to work with UX researchers, developers, and project managers? As designers, we must collaborate cross-functionally to translate our designs from ideation to creation with various goals and constraints in mind. Come join us on Zoom to hear product designer Minjun Chen from Spotify share her experience and advice on working in cross-functional teams!

title: Design <> Developer Handoff
desc: Welcome back, designers! Get pumped for our first general meeting of spring quarter, where we‚Äôll be talking about cross-functional collaboration between designers and developers with Commit the Change :purple_heart: Learn about best practices during design handoff, including creating design systems, design documentation, and utilizing helpful handoff tools!

title: Project Teams Demo Day
desc: Come out to Project Teams Demo Day and see what your fellow designers have been creating the last 8 weeks! Project Teams is a quarterly program that provides students with design experience in a collaborative setting. Project Teams Demo Day is open to all general Design at UCI members and a great chance for teams to showcase their designs, research, and takeaways from the program!

title: Intro to Adobe Illustrator
desc: Have you always wanted to learn how to make your own graphics? If so, come join our Adobe Illustrator Workshop in ALP 1700 on 2/21 at 8pm! Participants will also have the chance to join on Zoom. This event will specifically be for beginners, and we‚Äôll be going over some of the application‚Äôs basic tools. Please make sure to have Adobe Illustrator downloaded on your computer before the event! The Adobe Creative Suite is free to all UCI students. The link to instructions on how to download the application will be in our bio!

title: Intro to Logo Design with UCSB Creative Lab
desc: Are you interested in designing iconic and memorable logos like Apple, Nike, and many other brands? Check out our Intro to Logo Design workshop in collaboration with UCSB Creative Lab. You‚Äôll learn about different types of logo, the design process, tips, and practice with hands-on exercises in our workshop!

title: Nailing Design Interviews: The Gaming Industry
desc: It's recruitment season, everyone! Hear all the tips and tricks from Anya Li @ Riot Games to hear about her experience as a designer in the gaming industry. Learn what you need to do to get your next dream design job!üëÄüôåüíØ

title: Pajama Movie Night
desc: Cozy up in your pajamas and join Design at UCI for a movie night, where we‚Äôll be playing a movie (exact movie TBA)! Pizza and snacks will be provided.

title: Product Design & Ideation
desc: Interested in learning more about product design? Join our beginner-friendly workshop as we discuss UI/UX design, ideation and evaluation, and the product development process. We'll also be taking a closer look at the design tool Figma and going through a quick idea generation/design thinking exercise!

title: Advanced topics in Figma with Product@UCI
desc: Interested in UI/UX design and want to learn how to creat cool projects and product design in Figma? Come join our workshop in collaboration with Product Association on Tuesday 11/8 in DBH 1600 at 8pm. We will cover some features and resources in Figma. Come join our workshop in collaboration with Product Association on Tuesday 11/8 in DBH 1600 at 8pm. We will cover some features and resources in Figma. There will also be fun follow-along design activity!

title: Developing your Personal Brand w/ Rachel Kim
desc: Ever wondered what a personal brand means? Stuck on how to improve your portfolio or just need some inspiration? DAUCI is hosting a speaker event presenting Rachel Kim, who has worked with Lucid Software, TOMS Shoes, and Mattel. Come hear our featured art director speak about branding and a design that is personal to YOU!

desc: Hey fellow DE-SIGN-ERS, come relax before or destress after your midterms with Design @ UCI at Tanaka Farms Pumpkin Patch! Please fill out the interest form since their will be a limited number of spots available. Come with us to solve corn mazes, frolic across the pumpkins patches and look at cute farm animals!

title: Design‚Ä¶at UCI and Beyond!
desc: Hello designers!! Join us for a special event about design at UCI and beyond held over Zoom hosted by our very own exec team. Learn about the resources and opportunities here at UCI to further your design skills, including organizations, classes, and jobs. Explore what post-grad paths look like for designers who graduate out of UCI including industry, research, and grad school. We also might be inviting a special guest, so stay tuned!!

title: DaUCI x WiCS: Intro to UI/UX
desc: Are you interested in learning more about UI/UX? Join our beginner-friendly workshop in collaboration with WiCS on Monday, 10/17 in DBH 6011 at 6:30pm! We'll be discussing both UI and UX design in great detail, including visual design fundamentals, evaluating for good UI, the UX design process, and applying design principles to your code. We'll also be taking a closer look at Figma, a design tool used in industry. Remember to RSVP (link in bio) if you plan on attending!

title: AMA (Ask Me Anything) Summer Internship Panel
desc: Hey designers! Design at UCI is holding a summer internship Ask Me Anything panel with our very own board in DBH 1600! Come and connect with our very own board members who will be detailing what their summer internship experience was like. Learn more about how you can land your next SWE, product, and/or UX/UI design internships

title: Game Night

Come to compete in the various games and collect tickets along the way to win some cool prizes. Game Night is a great place to meet new people, play board games and relax before classes start to ramp up. Admission is $3, see you there

title: Introductory Workshop
desc: Welcome back, anteaters üçÅ Join us in DBH 1600 for our first event of the year to meet the board, learn more about the events and programs for fall quarter, and get a brief introduction to design!

title: Project Teams Demo Day
desc: Interested in learning about working cross-functionally as a designer? Join us for a workshop in collaboration with UCSD Design Co (@ucsddesignco), where we‚Äôll be discussing what collaboration in industry looks like within design teams, as well as cross-functionally with engineers, PMs, and research teams.

title: Cross-Functional Design
desc: Interested in learning about working cross-functionally as a designer? Join us for a workshop in collaboration with UCSD Design Co (@ucsddesignco), where we‚Äôll be discussing what collaboration in industry looks like within design teams, as well as cross-functionally with engineers, PMs, and research teams.

title: Picnic in Aldrich
desc: Join us for a picnic in the middle of Aldrich where we'll host games, icebreakers, and food!

title: 2022 Spring Night Market
desc: Come support Design at UCI at the 2022 Spring Night Market on May 11th! We‚Äôll be selling egg tarts at 1 for $3, 2 for $4, and our rainbow heart pen tool sticker for $3. We‚Äôll be at booth #59, next to Langson Library from 5 to 9 PM ‚Äî join us for club festivities, fundraising fun, and good vibes

title: Mock Whiteboard Challenge
desc: Interested in practicing your design thinking skills? Unsure about how to tackle a whiteboard challenge during a design interview? We will be hosting a Mock Whiteboard Challenge event, in which participants will be paired with a design expert to complete a virtual whiteboard challenge on Figma! Note that due to high demand, spots are limited so keep an eye out for sign-ups when they open!

title: Ask Me Anything: Student Intern Panel
desc: Curious about designing at the industry level? Not sure how to land internships? Swing by our Ask Me Anything: Student Intern Panel to ask student peers about their design internship experiences! From graphic to UI/UX to product, we‚Äôll have panelists from all types of design backgrounds. Be sure to prep any burning questions you may have, and we hope to see you there!

title: Game Night Extravaganza
desc: Join Design at UCI for an ultimate game night extravaganza! We‚Äôll be hosting a smash tournament as well as other board and card games to compete and play in! There will be a $3 admission fee & prizes!

title: Food And Fun At UTC
desc: Join us for boba and pizza at UTC! We‚Äôll eat pizza, have boba, play games, and get a chance to get to know other members of the club!

title: ICS Clubs Fair
desc: Come check out Design at UCI at the ICS Clubs Fair on Thursday (3/31) from 12-2pm! We‚Äôll be having flyers, freebies, and fun so make sure to stop by and say hi!

title: Presenting Your Designs
desc: Welcome back from spring break, designers! Join us for our first in-person workshop of the year to learn how to effectively present your designs! Excited to see you all there! :)

title: Design Social: Design at UCI x SB Creative Lab
desc: Hey designers! Nervous about the upcoming designathon? Come meet other designers (potential team members!) from both UCI and UCSB at our social. We'll be creating cute little trading cards on Figma so we can all get to know each other better. It'll be a fun and chill event so make sure to come through!

title: Components and Prototyping
desc: Welcome back, designers! Hope everyone had a festive holiday season. We‚Äôre starting off winter quarter by exploring how components and prototyping are used within Figma and the overall design process. Join us for a hands-on workshop that focuses on how components can increase workflow efficiency and how Figma facilitates the building of complex prototypes!

title: Project Teams Demo Day
desc: See what Project Teams has been up to this quarter! Each group will get the chance to present and share their hard work.

title: Autumn Night Market
desc: Visit our booth during the UCI Autumn Night Market event. We will be selling stickers and food to fundraise. See you there!

title: Smash Tournament
desc: We will be hosting a Super Smash Bros Tournament Week 8 Monday. The top three winners will be awarded a prize, as well as a shout-out on Design at UCI's social media. Entrance fees are $3 per person.

title: Portfolio Tips and Review with Industry Professionals
desc: Portfolios are a super important way to showcase your design skills and differentiate yourself whether you're in UI/UX or graphic design. If you‚Äôre looking for tips on how to present your portfolio and potentially even get them reviewed by professionals in the industry, come sign up for our event!! People will be randomly selected to get their portfolios reviewed from the sign-ups (which are due November 2 11:59 p.m.) and contacted with instructions on what to prepare.

title: Fireside Chat with Professor Arpita
desc: Looking to learn more about UX in academia? Come to our second industry event of the year where Dr. Arpita, one of our very own Informatics professors here at UC Irvine, will discuss her career in academia along with her studies of designing for health and human behavior change. If you‚Äôre interested, come join our fireside chat with Dr. Arpita!

title: User Research 101
desc: Nearly all of today‚Äôs products, designs, and applications revolve around the one same thing: users. Learn about typical research methods at our workshop to find out how you can better understand users!

title: Social Media Marketing
desc: Why do so many organizations focus on social media marketing? How can good design techniques increase the effectiveness of marketing via social media? If these topics interest you, join us at our Social Media Marketing workshop, an event in collaboration with Marketing Association!

title: Visual Design Workshop
desc: What makes a design aesthetically pleasing? Why do certain color combinations look good together? Find the answers to these questions and more at our Visual Design workshop!

title: Speaker Panel: Explore Careers in Design
desc: Looking to learn more about design? Come to our first industry event of the year and learn from a panel of designers currently working in the field! Each speaker will give valuable insight into their career and experience in the industry. If you‚Äôre interested in the fields of product design, UX design, visual design, or graphic design, join us this Friday!

title: Introductory Workshop
desc: Get a chance to meet the Design at UCI board. See what workshops we'll be hosting this quarter and learn about the best ways you can take advantage of the resources we have to offer. Also get a brief introduction to design.

title: Project Teams Presentations
desc: It's almost the end of Spring Quarter! You know what that means... Project Teams Presentations! The theme was open-ended so participants were allowed to go creative with their projects. Attend the meeting this Friday to see what our teams have made!

title: Game Night Social
desc: This week we will be having a game night social. Come hang out with peers and board as we play some virtual games together. This event will take place on Discord at 6PM so join our server by this Friday! Let's have some fun!

title: Social Media Marketing
desc: Are you a board member of a campus organization that‚Äôs struggling with marketing? Join Design at UCI‚Äôs crash course on marketing specifically for student organizations! We‚Äôll be going over some basic aspects of branding such as logo, flyer, and web design that you can utilize to attract more attention on campus. As a design based organization, we‚Äôll also be sharing some of our own marketing tips and tricks that have been effective for our club!

title: Happy Hour Social
desc: This week, we will have a happy hour to chill after classes, bond with one another, and relax with your favorite drink (non-alcoholic drinks for anyone underage ofc ;). We will also have a live tutorial on how to make a Mojito ü•¥. The event will be hosted over Discord at 6pm, so let's meet, make drinks, and chat with videos on! We can always switch to playing games or wherever the night leads.

title: Something in Common
desc: Get to know your fellow designers better! We‚Äôll put participants into groups and they'll work together to find something in common in several different rounds. More limitations will be added each round to increase difficulty.

title: How to Conduct User Interviews
desc: UX designers utilize user interviews early in the design process to understand the audience they are designing for. How do you organize a user interview? We'll be going over the basics in this workshop so you'll be ready to conduct user interviews for your own projects! We will also be hosting an after-event social, 'Something in Common', so stick around to the end and get to know each other!

title: Ask Me Anything: Student Intern Panel
desc: Join us for an "ask-me-anything" panel from fellow UCI students on how they've landed design internships and roles! We'll be discussing personal tips from our own job application processes, so come prepared with questions or just come chat for a chill time!

title: Persuasive Design with Marketing Association
desc: Join us for this exciting collab workshop with Marketing Association as we explore persuasive design: design principles based on human behavior and psychology! How do these principles influence decision-making, and how can both designers and marketers use this knowledge to their advantage to create better user experiences and increased conversions? Don‚Äôt miss out on this special cross-subject deep dive into the effects of persuasive design in guiding users towards marketing goals!

title: The Basics of UX Recruiting
desc: Portfolios? Resumes? What's a whiteboard challenge? Are you interested in applying for UI/UX roles, but don't know what to expect? We'll be going over the different kinds of UX jobs, tips on the job application process, and how to position yourself for a design role no matter your major.

title: Introduction to UX with Jane Chang
desc: Jane is a Product Design Lead at Google in Irvine/Seattle. Before Google, she worked for Walt Disney, Universal Pictures, Toyota/Lexus, Apple, Volkswagen AG and led product design in the cybersecurity space. She started her career in the agency world at Saatchi & Saatchi and RPA, and led design at TBWA/Chiat/Day. She studied Graphic Design at NYU and received her Master's in Visual Communication from Johns Hopkins University. Jane currently lives in Irvine with her husband and 6-year-old son.

title: How to Nail your UX Interview with Chris Ota
desc: Originally from Hawaii, Chris Ota started off designing and building websites after graduating community college 13 years ago. He packed his bags in 2015 and moved to San Francisco with no job lined up, looking for a new chapter in his life. Starting from the bottom as a product designer, Chris has been at Lyft for about 3.5 years now, focused on patient transportation to and from their appointments. Besides his day to day, he helps with interviewing full time and intern candidates, does design mentorship at work, and is an active mentor with ADPList.
